name: expanse-marketing-monorepo
description: Expanse Marketing survey SAAS platform monorepo

scripts.dev:all: pnpm shared:build && concurrently "pnpm shared:dev" "pnpm firebase:build:watch" "pnpm firebase:emulators" "pnpm --filter @meridian-event-tech/web-app dev" "pnpm dev:open-browsers"
scripts.dev:all:update: pnpm shared:build && concurrently "pnpm shared:dev" "pnpm firebase:build:watch" "pnpm firebase:emulators:update" "pnpm --filter @meridian-event-tech/web-app dev" "pnpm dev:open-browsers"
scripts.firebase:emulators: cd packages/firebase && firebase use dev && firebase emulators:start --import=./emulator-data
scripts.firebase:emulators:update: cd packages/firebase && firebase use dev && firebase emulators:start --import=./emulator-data --export-on-exit=./emulator-data
scripts.ford-ui:update: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd packages/ford-ui && git pull origin develop && nx build @ui/ford-ui-components && cd ../.. && ./packages/web-app/scripts/sync-ford-ui.sh
scripts.postinstall: echo 'CSS sync handled by sync-ford-ui.sh script'

author: Latitude Digital
